pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Cronus's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gashacon_bugvisor_ii_chronos)Gashacon Bugvisor II (Chronus)$(/l)$(br)Used to craft a Ride-Player's $(l:ex_aid/devices/rideplayerbelt)Ride-Player Buckle$(/l)$(br)Used to craft Nico Saiba's $(l:ex_aid/devices/rideplayerbelt_nico)Ride-Player Buckle (Nico)$(/l) and $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_nico_snipe)Gamer Driver (Snipe Nico)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Cronus's $(l:ex_aid/riders/cronus#chronicle)Chronicle Gamer$(/l)
